page.title: OMiSCID Download Page
page.custom:content:
Latest Stable Releases
ReleaseVersionFormatDistributionDescription
C++1.4.0 (Mac OSX, Linux, Windows 32 bits)zipOmiscid-1.4.0.zipThe C++ implementation of containing the necessary files and instruction about how to build the library.
1.4.0 (Debian package)debomiscid_1.4-6_i386.deb
omiscid-dev_1.4-6_i386.debA Debian package to install using avahi (as there is no Debian package for MDNS from Apple). There are 2 versions : standard and developper.
Java Library and old GUI (Java 5.0)1.4.0zipomiscid-lib-and-gui-1.4.0.zipThe java implementation of containing basic classes. This package also contains the old GUI.
GUI1.0ยนzipomiscidgui.zipThe current implementation of the GUI.
OSGi1.4.0zipomiscid-bundle-1.4.0.zipAn OSGi interface to .
Python1.4.0zipOMiSCID-Python-1.4.0.zipA Python wrapper to the C++ libraries
ยน: version number is unrelated to version as continuous update are provided in the GUI. Starting and updating the GUI should bring you to the latest stable java version.
Previous Releases
Access to the previous releases is provided through a "forge". The download page in the forge.
Documentations
Documentation on how to install and tutorials are available on the documentation page.
